name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Principal Backend Engineer with over 13 years of experience in backend development, specializing in clean code and end-to-end development. Proficient in **Go**, **TypeScript**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, employing efficient algorithms and data structures to optimize performance. Skilled in building high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors, with hands-on experience in **C++** and **Rust**. Experienced in implementing best practices for software quality and scalability, focusing on maintainable and robust code. 

Demonstrated expertise in delivering AI/ML-powered platforms, utilizing **Python** and **Flutter** for full stack development, while leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend solutions. Proficient in deploying cloud-native architectures on **AWS** and **Azure**, integrating microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with **HIPAA**, **FHIR**, **PCI DSS**, and **SOC 2** standards. Strong background in MLOps, including orchestration and model serving using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
